Class RequireDeveloperRoles

java.lang.Object
org.apache.maven.enforcer.rule.api.AbstractEnforcerRule
org.codehaus.mojo.extraenforcer.model.RequireDeveloperRoles
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.enforcer.rule.api.EnforcerRuleBase
@Named("requireDeveloperRoles") public class RequireDeveloperRoles extends org.apache.maven.enforcer.rule.api.AbstractEnforcerRule
This rule checks that certain developer roles are filled.
Since:
1.0-alpha-3
Author:
Mirko Friedenhagen
